title: S1 Ep19: Breaking gender-barriers: How women are becoming managers
itunes:title: Breaking gender-barriers: How women are becoming managers
description:
How do we get more women in senior positions? Chris Woodruff shares insights from the Bangladeshi garment industry.

Find out more at [VoxDev.org](https://voxdev.org/topic/firms-trade/breaking-gender-barriers-how-women-are-becoming-managers)
